sexes:
<biblical_sex> = { male female ambiguous }
<intersex> = { gynomorph andromorph intersex }
<herms> = (<biblical_sex> CROSS { _herm }) UNION { herm }
<sexes> = <biblical_sex>
	UNION <intersex>
	UNION <herms>
	UNION { ambiguous_gender }
	MINUS { ambiguous }

global export <sexes>
pairings:
import <sexes> from sexes
<sexes> = <sexes> UNION { ambiguous } MINUS { ambiguous_gender } <sex_slash_pairs> = <sexes> CROSS { / } CROSS <sexes>
<sex_penetration_pairs> = <sexes> CROSS { _penetrating_ } CROSS <sexes>
global export <sex_slash_pairs>
global export <sex_penetration_pairs>
backgrounds:
import <colors> from attributes

<background_types> = <colors> UNION {
	simple
	amazing
	detailed
	photo
	screencap
	3d
	blowup
	gradient
	
	# break patterns into their own section?
	pattern
	checkered
	dotted
	halftone
	striped
	textured
	abstract
	spiral
	text
}

<backgrounds> = <background_types> CROSS { _background }

global export <backgrounds>
character_counts:
<character_counts> = {
	zero_pictured
	solo
	duo
	group
}

<focus_counts> = (<character_counts> MINUS { zero_pictured group }) CROSS { _focus }

global export <character_counts>
global export <focus_counts>
body_parts:
import <sizes> from attributes
import <colors> from attributes

<usually_male_genitals> = {
	penis
	balls
}

<usually_female_genitals> = {
	pussy
	# Yes everyone has these, but male nipples are not explicit
	breasts
	nipples
	areola
}

<shared_genitals> = {
	butt
	anus
}

<genitals> = <usually_male_genitals>
	UNION <usually_female_genitals>
	UNION <shared_genitals> 
	UNION { genitals }

<standard_body_parts> = {
	body
	hair
	fur
	tongue
	horn
	eyes
	teeth
	feet
	claws
	wings
	navel # AKA belly button
	toes
	tuft
	paws
	pawpads
	belly
	pecs
	abs
	vein
	fingers
	
	# These are not really body parts, but they're close enough?
	feathers
	scales

	# Thighs are not listed anywhere, but thick_thighs are
	thighs
	thick_thighs
	hips
}

# Do Something with these
# 5_fingers
# 4_fingers

<all_body_parts> = <standard_body_parts> UNION <genitals>
<body_parts> = (<sizes> CROSS { _ } CROSS <all_body_parts>)
	UNION (<colors> CROSS { _ } CROSS <all_body_parts>)

global export <genitals>
global export <standard_body_parts>
global export <body_parts>
bodily_fluids:
<safe_fluids> = {
	saliva # AKA spit
	sweat
}

<explicit_fluids> = {
	cum
	feces
	pussy_juice
}

<bodily_fluids> = <safe_fluids>
	UNION <explicit_fluids>
	UNION { bodily_fluids genital_fluids }

global export <bodily_fluids>
attributes:
<colors> = { 
	# https://e621.net/wiki/show/tag_group:colors
	# https://sashat.me/2017/01/11/list-of-20-simple-distinct-colors/
	black
	grey
	white
	
	maroon
	brown
	red
	orange
	yellow
	pink
	beige
	teal
	cyan
	green
	mint
	navy
	blue
	lavender
	magenta
	
	rainbow
	transparent

	invalid
}

<sizes> = {
	small
	medium
	big
	huge
	hyper
	long
	thick
	wide
}

export <colors>
export <sizes>
